snippet: “Henri Matisse: The Cut-Outs,” at the Museum of Modern Art, presents about 100 painted-paper works, produced during a difficult era for the artist.
abstract: Holland Cotter reviews exhibition of paintings by Henri Matisse at Museum of Modern Art.
lead_paragraph: “Henri Matisse: The Cut-Outs,” at the Museum of Modern Art, presents about 100 painted-paper works, produced during a difficult era for the artist.

headline.seo: ‘Henri Matisse: The Cut-Outs,’ a Victory Lap at MoMA
headline.main: Wisps From an Old Man’s Dreams
headline.print_headline: Wisps From an Old Man’s Dreams
